title: Apelsin Tight Nicotine Pouches by HIT
description: TRY HIT APELSIN TIGHT NICOTINE POUCHES Challenge your expectations with Apelsin Tight Nicotine Pouches by HIT , where orange flavour meets an extraordinary nicotine intensity. Brace yourself for an extra-strong kick seamlessly blended with the refreshing essence of juicy oranges. The flavour profile achieves a flawless equilibrium, striking a perfect balance between the natural sweetness and subtle sourness, creating a taste that is both authentic and invigorating. View all HIT Nicotine Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: Fruity flavoured nicotine pouches 14MG Per Pouch | 20MG Per Gram Perfect option for those looking to quit smoking Effective nicotine absorption Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Suitable for all environments. MORE ABOUT APELSIN FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES These pouches combine the natural, juicy orange flavour with an extra-strong nicotine hit (20 mg/g). The flavour profile is perfectly balanced, bringing out the sweetness of ripe oranges with a hint of sourness for a complete experience. MORE ABOUT HIT NICOTINE POUCHES GN Tobacco Sweden's HIT introduces an all-white, tobacco-free product boasting an exceptionally high nicotine level, drawing design inspiration from the bold and fierce black panther. For those seeking a departure from overly sweet or mundane white goods, HIT presents a range of five fruity and crisp flavours that promise to invigorate the palate. With options like Blackberry, Blueberry, Apelsin, Dr. Cherry, and Lemongrass, each carrying a potent 20 mg/g of nicotine. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: HIT Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Extra Strong Nicotine Per Pouch 14 MG Nicotine Per Gram 20MG Flavour Name: Apelsin Tight Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
